entries.prose_junk_sold: %TT is already in the process of being sold...
entries.prose_no_buy_all: %TT does not seem interested in buying any of your junk.
entries.prose_no_all_sale: %TT is unable to purchase all of your junk and declines the transaction.
entries.prose_sold_all_junk: You sell all of your junk to %TT for %DI credits.
entries.sell_prompt: Select the item you wish to sell to this junk dealer.
entries.convo_start: If you have any items you wish to sell, just hand them to me and I'll give you credits... if I am interested.
entries.prose_no_sale: %TU cannot buy %TT from you, at this time.
